post.instructions: Here's a list of our labels. Please reply with the numbers of the labels you would like separated by commas. For example, if you want ({{labelExamples}}), reply with "{{numberList}}"
post.verification: *Labels with asterisks will require manual verification

error.maxLabels: Your account already has the maximum number of labels that we allow ({{maxLabels}}). If you would like to switch to some new labels, you can remove labels from an account by using the 'unlabel' command.
error.commandNotAvailable: This command is not available at the moment. please try again later.
